survey_name: Electric Vehicle Owner Charging Habits Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the charging habits, preferences, and pain points of electric vehicle (EV) owners to improve charging infrastructure and services.

questions.question_text: What is the primary type of electric vehicle you own?
questions.client_notes: Ensure options cover all major EV types for accurate segmentation.

script.question_text: What is the primary type of electric vehicle you own?

questions.question_text: How often do you charge your electric vehicle per week?
questions.client_notes: Use a clear frequency scale to capture charging behavior patterns.

script.question_text: How often do you charge your electric vehicle per week?

questions.question_text: Where do you primarily charge your electric vehicle? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to understand charging location preferences.

script.question_text: Where do you primarily charge your electric vehicle? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What are the biggest challenges you face when charging your electric vehicle?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights on pain points.

script.question_text: What are the biggest challenges you face when charging your electric vehicle?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public charging stations in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public charging stations in your area?
